description: Theta series of quadratic form (or lattice) with Gram matrix [ 3, 1; 1, 8 ].
comments: The number of integer solutions (x, y) to 3*x^2 + 2*x*y + 8*y^2, discriminant -92. - _Ray Chandler_, Jul 12 2014
links: John Cannon, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
N. J. A. Sloane et al., Binary Quadratic Forms and OEIS (Index to related sequences, programs, references)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
